thread.title: Paris attack suspect jailed over police shootout

title: Paris attack suspect jailed over police shootout
text:
Paris attack suspect jailed over police shootout 11:42am BST - 00:53 
Salah Abdeslam, the main surviving suspect from in the 2015 Paris attacks has been found guilty of attempted murder in a separate case relating to a police shootout. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Salah Abdeslam, the main surviving suspect from in the 2015 Paris attacks has been found guilty of attempted murder in a separate case relating to a police shootout. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2F9ESzL
